name: Psychic Barrier Training
description: Developing mental shielding techniques against thought intrusion, psychic attacks, and emotional infiltration.

cards.title: Constructing a Mental Shield
cards.description: Creating a persistent, reinforced mental barrier to block external intrusions.
cards.bulletpoints: Mental Visualization, Thought Armor Techniques, Reinforcement Sequences

cards.title: Neutralizing Thought Intrusion
cards.description: Identifying and removing intrusive, implanted, or foreign thought patterns.
cards.bulletpoints: Recognizing External Influence, Deprogramming Mental Loops, Internal Cognitive Scrubbing

cards.title: Defensive Energy Signatures
cards.description: Emitting a protective psychic resonance to deter external manipulations.
cards.bulletpoints: Aura Reinforcement, Mental Frequency Control, Defensive Energy Projection
